content:

inventory=[{"type": "dragon_head", "quantity": 18, "index": 13}, {"type": "mushroom_stem", "quantity": 13, "index": 14}, {"type": "mossy_stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 17, "index": 21}, {"type": "brown_concrete_powder", "quantity": 59, "index": 25}, {"type": "chest", "quantity": 19, "index": 31}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 6, "index": 32}, {"type": "netherite_block", "quantity": 13, "index": 33}, {"type": "redstone_ore", "quantity": 31, "index": 34}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: To craft blue_stained_glass_pane, I need to place 3x3 blue_stained_glass blocks in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the blue_stained_glass block from slot 32 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: The next step is to place another blue_stained_glass block to the right of the previous one, so I will move the blue_stained_glass block from slot 32 to slot 2.
Ok
